channel.title: Gold4rs.com/ THS Inc. - Is it a scam?
channel.description:
I want to buy a $600.00 Dollar account of gold4rs.com, but i don't want to get scammed out of 600 usd! Is it a scam?
OR
Any suggestions?

item.title: Gold4rs.com/ THS Inc. - Is it a scam?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

^QFT

& enough flaming…

Read full topic

item.title: Gold4rs.com/ THS Inc. - Is it a scam?
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

[quote=“Jussel, post:27, topic:202352”]Its NOT a scam, because I’ve sold alot of accounts to them
I gave password and all other details first, and they always have paid!
They are 100% Trustable,

and btw:

ALL OTHER PPL WHO SAYS ‘UR LITTLE NERD, OR SAD NOOB’ GET A LIFE
JUST LET HIM BUY A ACCOUNT IF HE WANTS, SO DONT FUCKING SPAM NOOBS

good luck …[/quote]
Please, please please dont use the word noobs. I hate it when a total idiot calls someone else a noob all it means is someone that is new and by the looks of it you are the biggest noob round. On top of that you fail.

Read full topic

They are 100% Trustable,

and btw:

ALL OTHER PPL WHO SAYS ‘UR LITTLE NERD, OR SAD NOOB’ GET A LIFE
JUST LET HIM BUY A ACCOUNT IF HE WANTS, SO DONT FUCKING SPAM NOOBS

good luck …

item.source: Gold4rs.com/ THS Inc. - Is it a scam?

item.title: Gold4rs.com/ THS Inc. - Is it a scam?
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:18, topic:202352”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=267073.msg2205751#msg2205751 date=1209358499]

With $600 you can get a plane ticket to hawaii or mexico

The chances are he is a little boy. So is he going by himself? Sure he has the money to get one but will his parents let him?

I’d think his parents would rather waist it on that then something they wont need in life.

Your right they wouldn’t want to waste it, But it’s in the middle of the school year. If I asked my parents they would laugh.

My schools over in a month. Unless this kid works…I’d think the parents would smack him before he finished the sentence.
[/quote]

Knowing his parents agreed assumed to letting him spend $600 on a RuneScape account, what makes you think they’ll smack him now?[/quote]
:Usually: Parents would laugh. His parents must be dumbasses, rich, or both.

Read full topic
